englelab 0.1.0
  • Reference

Download template R scripts

Source: R/get_script.R
get_script.Rd

This function will download R script templates for tasks commonly used in the EngleLab

get_script(type = "all", to = "R Scripts", overwrite = FALSE,
  gf = FALSE, wmc = FALSE, ac = FALSE, antisaccade = FALSE,
  stroop = FALSE, flanker = FALSE, stroopDL = FALSE,
  flankerDL = FALSE, va4 = FALSE, sact = FALSE, path = "./")

Arguments

type

String. Do you want to download "raw" or "score" task template files?
to

a directory where to download R scripts
gf

Logical. Do you want to download template scripts for the gf taks?
wmc

Logical. Do you want to download template scripts for the wmc taks?
ac

Logical. Do you want to download template scripts for all the attention taks?
antisaccade

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the antisaccade task?
stroop

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the Stroop task?
flanker

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the flanker task?
stroopDL

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the StroopDL task?
flankerDL

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the FlankerDL task?
va4

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the Visual Arrays 4 task?
sact

Logical. Do you want to download a template file for the SACT task?
path

String. Home directory file path

Contents

  • Arguments
